data.text:
Welcome to the Xeâ¯money transfer app, your one-stop destination for all your currency exchange and international money transfer needs.

HUNDREDS of MILLIONS of people trust Xe:

â Check live rates

â Send money internationally to 200+ countries

â Transfer across 100+ currencies

â Set Rate Alerts

â Fast, secure, and reliable way to transfer money around the world

â Over 105 million downloads

â Thousands of money transfers sent every day

Transfer Money in Minutes

â Transfer money in as fast as minutes to 200+ countries around the world.

â Competitive transfer rates that often beat those offered by banks and other money transfer providers

â Real-time mid-market rates for global currencies

â Easily create a money transfer account using our app, get an instant quote, and send money straightaway once you've selected your currency pair and checked the mid-market rate

â Easily track your money transfer from the moment you confirm it until we send it out

Send International Money Transfers to 200+ Countries

â Send money internationally to over 200 countries, including India, Mexico, and the Philippines

â Whether you're sending money to friends and family, paying for goods and services, or making international payments, Xe has you covered

Easy to use

Send money on the go whenever you like. Plus, you can exit your transfer and easily pick up where you left off

Flexible Payment Methods

â Flexible payment methods to make it easy for you to transfer money internationally

â Choose from bank transfer, direct debit/ACH, debit card, or credit card, depending on what works best for your needs

Your choice of secure Payout Methods

â Choose from multiple payout methods for your recipient to receive your money transfer, including bank deposit, cash pickup, and mobile wallet

â Send money directly to hundreds of major banks globally, and you can also pick up cash at over 500,000 convenient locations in more than 150 countries.

â Send money directly to major mobile wallets in 35+ countries around the world.

Bank Deposits

We send money transfers directly to hundreds of major banks globally.

Cash Pickup

Send international money transfers for cash pickup to over 500,000 locations in 150+ countries globally

Mobile Wallets

Send money directly to your loved ones in 35+ countries with trusted providers

Send Money to India

Our money transfers to India feature our everyday great rates and lightning-fast transfers. You can send money to India for bank deposit, cash pickup, or mobile wallets

Send money to Mexico

With everyday great rates and options for bank deposit, cash pickup and mobile wallets, sending money to Mexico has never been better at Xe

REFER FRIENDS & NOW EARN $25+

Get unlimited $25 bonuses for every friend who signs up and sends a transfer (or more) totaling in $1000+

1 friend = $25, 3 friends = $75, 10 friends = $250, and so on

Fast. Smart. Simple.

Join millions of people who trust Xe for their currency info and international money transfers.

â Currency charts

â Set rate alerts

â Track your transfers

â Face ID & 2FA privacy controls

Track Your Currencies

â Comprehensive currency charts that allow you to check the status of your chosen currencies today and anytime within the last 10 years.

â Set rate alerts for your chosen currency pairs, and we'll notify you when your target mid-market rate is live.

Regulated and Secure

Regulated by global regulatory bodies, so you can rest assured that your money is in safe hands. Global customer support team of currency experts to assist with all your currency needs

Whether you're looking to send money internationally, check exchange rates, or stay up to date with the currency markets, the Xe money transfer app has you covered. With our app, you can send money internationally with ease, track your money transfer every step of the way, and choose from flexible payment and payout methods.

Download the Xe app today and send money internationally with confidence.
